Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for early retirement without a pension reduction for certain disabled veterans
Summary: Provides that a member of a public retirement system of the state who is a disabled veteran may retire without reduction of their retirement benefit upon their attainment of at least fifty-five years of age and completion of at least thirteen years of credited service in such retirement system.
LawCode: Add Art 20-A ยง1005, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing for early retirement without a pension reduction for certain disabled veterans
